remarks: Complex exponentiation of a quotient.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2016.)
statement:
recxpcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
recxpcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ A ) $.
divcxpd.4 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR+ ) $.
divcxpd.5 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
divcxpd $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A / B ) ^c C ) = ( ( A ^c C ) / ( B ^c C ) ) ) $.
